mapper.sql: id, name, pwd, realname, sex, hobbys, birthday, city, email, qq, createTime, state
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
pwd,
realname,
sex,
hobbys,
birthday,
city,
email,
qq,
createTime,
state,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hobbys = #{hobbys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobbys = #{hobbys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
